name: Scholar
flower_description: A dried flower used as a bookmark, it had absorbed the scent from the pages.
feather_description: A bird's feather that serves as a quill pen, the tip has long been stained black.
sand_description: A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.
goblet_description: Originally designed to hold drinking water, this cup was stained black after a scholar used it to wash their paint brushes.
circlet_description: This corrective lens helped restore the vision of one whose eyes were damaged from intensive studying.
four_pc_bonus: Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.
